name: occidental
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the western part of the world, especially the countries of Europe and America: occidental cultures The music is a mix of occidental pop and Latin sensuality. Compare
orientalSee
the Occident
More examplesFewer examplesThese words may sound exaggerated to the occidental mind.This is the most common form of dementia in occidental countries.The exhibition will look at occidental fashion from a new perspective.
